title: Oliver Dowden – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Oliver Dowden, the Conservative MP for Hertsmere, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
Rishi Sunak is clearly the best person to lead our country through these difficult and turbulent times. That’s why I’m supporting him to be Leader of the Conservative Party and Prime Minister.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London
  *[HIV]: human immunodeficiency virus
  *[AI]: artificial intelligence
